Someone will help check you in and let you know when it is your turn to shop.  You can also create a reservation every 14 days through the following link. You will be asked to create an account where you can schedule and cancel reservations:  Online Reservations   If you cannot make it to your reservation, please go to the portal to change or cancel it. You can also call 801-709-8573. If you miss too many reservations, you will lose the priviledge of making a reservation and you will have to wait longer to be able to shop.
